title: He made a silly trombone video game. Then the internet caught wind.
description: Making the trombone sound good is an art — one in which “Trombone Champ” has zero interest.

title: With eye on storm, NASA presses ahead with Artemis launch attempt
description: NASA is hoping to launch its Space Launch System rocket and uncrewed Orion spacecraft to the moon as soon as Tuesday.

title: NASA hopes to hit an asteroid now in case we really need to knock one away later
description: NASA is launching a spacecraft head-on into an asteroid, hoping to change the space rock's orbit. It is a test in case we really need to smack one out of the way someday.

title: Fueled by Netflix and patches, ‘Cyberpunk 2077’ gets a ‘second chance’
description: There's no better time than now to play 2020's most infamous video game.

title: Yes, AirPods can double as hearing aids. Here’s how.
description: Here are the best headphone and earbud options for people with hearing loss.

title: Pentagon launches effort to assess crypto’s threat to national security
description: DARPA, the Pentagon's tech hub, is kicking off a sweeping review of the national security and law enforcement threats posed by the rise of cryptocurrency.
